title: 2020thanksgivingmealticket
content:
Neighbors in our community are struggling this holiday season. The COVID-19 pandemic just makes their struggle worse.

Your gift today provides practical help like hot, nutritious meals for hungry people. Plus a wide range of programs that help people get a new start through addiction recovery and life skills training, supported by people who care.

Lives are changing at Portland Rescue Mission! Please help as many people as possible with a generous gift today.
